name: Segugio Pallido
description:
FLAVOR:

  • Duelist

  • Precision combat, maneuverability

  • Must maintain good form!

WEAPONS

  • Light, common, light firearms

  • Light armor, no helms

ENGAGEMENT:

  • Many small dice

  • Lots of success options, fancy

ABILITIES

  • Form: benefits while maintaining, penalties while out of form

  • Dual wielding

  • Extra movement as reaction?
